name.japanese: 人間オークション会場

description: A slave auction house located at Grove 1 of Sabaody Archipelago, where humans and other species are sold as slaves. The building is run by Disco and backed by Donquixote Doflamingo's criminal network.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Human Auctioning House
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats arrive at the auction house to rescue Camie, learning that Celestial Dragons are present which complicates their rescue plan.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the central stage for one of the most important confrontations in the Sabaody Archipelago arc.

keyEvents.title: The Human Auction Begins
keyEvents.description: Disco begins the monthly slave auction, establishing the horrific nature of the slave trade at Sabaody.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the auction mechanics and the dehumanizing pricing system for different types of slaves.

keyEvents.title: Celestial Dragons Arrive at Auction
keyEvents.description: Saint Rosward, Saint Charlos, and Saint Shalria arrive at the auction house as buyers.
keyEvents.significance: The presence of World Nobles escalates the danger and prevents the Straw Hats from using force.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as a slave auction house

description: The main headquarters of the Marines, where high-ranking officers like Garp receive intelligence and make strategic decisions.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Being Sold at Auction Revealed to Garp
keyEvents.description: A Marine soldier reports to Vice Admiral Garp that Silvers Rayleigh is being sold at the Sabaody auction, but Garp decides not to intervene.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Marines' strategic restraint as they prepare for war with Whitebeard rather than engaging another legend.

description: A unique archipelago near the Red Line where pirates gather before entering the New World. The island is known for its bubble-making trees and is a hub for the slave trade.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Execution Announced at Sabaody
keyEvents.description: News of Ace's impending execution spreads across Sabaody Archipelago, shocking pirates and civilians alike.
keyEvents.significance: The announcement reaches the supernovas and sets the stage for the world-changing events to come.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Lost and Asking for Directions
keyEvents.description: Zoro is shown wandering Sabaody, lost and asking pirates for directions to Grove 1.
keyEvents.significance: Comedic moment showing Zoro's poor sense of direction while building tension for his eventual arrival.
